summary:
A three room underground abode located on a tiny island! No one will ever suspect a thing! ... Erm well, except for the Spanish Inquisition. Those cheeky bastards always ruin everything!!

I'm now taking requests~ If you want something added feel free to comment.
descriptionHtml:
[b]I'm now taking requests~ If you want something added feel free to comment.[/b]

[b]INTRODUCTION[/b]
[URL=http://s580.photobucket.com/user/Death811/media/2014-07-01_00004_zpse38968f1.jpg.html][IMG]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss242/Death811/2014-07-01_00004_zpse38968f1.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Well howdy neighbors! It's me, BillNyeTheScienceGuy. (Such a creative name, right?) Anyway! I'm back after my computer decided to kill it'self! Making me lose soooo~ much data and porn. But enough about me and my problems .... Back to the topic at hand! Tiny Island Hideout is yet another small room'd abode for the player to relax in~ There's still much to do but I'm taking it one step at a time!

As always~ My abode are rarely nav-meshed. I don't use followers and I never will, sorry. Plus the layout of my homes are always tiny, the way I like 'em ;D (I Swear I have a fetish for small houses) So do not ask that I nav-mesh! Anyhoo~ Blah Blah Blah, more crap.



[b]UPDATES[/b]
New!>1.1 Happy 4th erry'one 'Murica it up.
Added new containers-
Custom Bookcase in bedroom where books are.
Strongbox
Ingredients&Potion Shelf along with a Alchemy table in the entrance.

Misc Fixs
Fixed the wolf head as it was tilted
Tweaked the lighting


[b]WHAT'S INSIDE[/b]
A world of pure imagination~ (Nope.avi)

(And yes. All the containers are safe :P)

[b]THE LAYOUT[/b]
Alright, so there are three rooms! Might expand more, might not.

[b]THE ENTRANCE[/b]
Pretty snazzy huh? From here you can go anywhere! (WRONG) Only left and right. Do anything other than that, it's a paddling.
[URL=http://s580.photobucket.com/user/Death811/media/2014-07-01_00006_zps04d9108b.jpg.html][IMG]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss242/Death811/2014-07-01_00006_zps04d9108b.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[b]THE KITCHEN[/b]
Woowee! Makin' bacon!
[URL=http://s580.photobucket.com/user/Death811/media/2014-07-01_00002_zpsaba793ba.jpg.html][IMG]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss242/Death811/2014-07-01_00002_zpsaba793ba.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

[b]THE BEDROOM (OF DOOOM)[/b]
Cozy and warm. Or perhaps the walls will close in on you and kill you in your sleep ... Who knows?!
[URL=http://s580.photobucket.com/user/Death811/media/2014-07-01_00003_zps85286afa.jpg.html][IMG]http://i580.photobucket.com/albums/ss242/Death811/2014-07-01_00003_zps85286afa.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
author: billnyethescienceguy
